title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 416.4 - Acquisition applications
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 416.4 - Acquisition applications

State Regulations

All applications submitted for the prior approval of the
superintendent to merge with, purchase and/or assume, or acquire control (as
defined in the applicable provisions of the Banking Law) of, any licensed check
casher or licensed money transmitter shall in every case be accompanied by
information demonstrating compliance with, or a plan that would comply with, the requirements set forth in section
416.1
of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
416.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
